nodes.text: Mroc was a Kadrillian Nociv at the time of Darth Vader's attempt to conquer Kadril in 1 ABY.

Mroc was an older Kadrillian of a Nociv village of which also Deerna was a member. Rodno, Han Solo and Luke Skywalker, warned the Nocivs for an ongoing attack by Stormtrooper s with Pacifog. Darth Vader wanted to collect all Kunda on Kadril and these stocks were located in the Nociv area.
After the death of Mdel, Mroc became one of the leaders of the Nociv.
